snippet: France should weigh all the offers on the table for the industrial company Alstom to make sure a sale is in the public interest, not just to avoid selling to an American company.
abstract: Editorial criticizes France's attempt to block General Electric's proposed acquisition of an energy business from French industrial company Alstom, saying it should weigh all offers on the table; argues action is an example of protectionist policies that will only hurt the French economy in the long term.
lead_paragraph: France should weigh all the offers on the table for the industrial company Alstom to make sure a sale is in the public interest, not just to avoid selling to an American company.
